contents.name: manufacturer
contents.description: Company name of the device manufacturer. Ex. Fibocom.

contents.name: model
contents.description: Device model name or ID. Ex. MA510.

contents.name: swVersion
contents.description: Version of the software on your device. This could be the version of your firmware. EX. 69400.1000.00.00.01.01

contents.name: osName
contents.description: Name of the operating system on the device. EX. ThreadX.
